titleStmt.title: SII 7.832: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 832. (A.R. No. 205 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu pu
ṇara puvimātu vaḷara nā
mātu viḷaṅka jayamātu
virumpa taṉnirupatumala
r maṉṉavar cūṭa manni
ya Urimaiyil maṇimu
ṭi cūṭi ceṅkol ceṉṟu
ticaitoṟum vaḷaṟpa veṅ
kali kaṭin=tu meyyaṟa n=ta
ḻaippa kaliṅka meriya
k kaṭakari naṭātti valaṅko
ḷāḻivarai yāḻi tiriya Iru
cuṭaraḷavu morukuṭai ni
ḻalkkiḻ virasiṅ
hāsanattutribhuvaṉamuṭaiyā⌈
ḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya tribhuvaṉa
cakravaṟti
kaḷ śrīvi
kramaceoru
ḻadevaṟ
ku yāṇṭu Añcāva
tu jayaṅkoṇṭaco
ḻamaṇṭalattu Oyamāṉā
ṭāna vijaiyaIrājentravaḷa
ṉāṭṭu kiṭaṅkilāṉa Irājentracoḻaṉal
lūr Ūrom nilavilai Āvaṇa me
ṅkaḷūr tiruttiṇṭivanamuṭaiyār koyil
caṇḍeśvaradevaṟku maṇavilmalai maturān=takaṉāṉa kaliṅka
māṉ kuṭutta Anṟāṭu naṟkācu ṉūṟṟirupatu Ikkācu ṉū
ṟṟirupatuṅ koṇṭu yittevarkku tirumeyppūccukku
m tevarkaḷukku Amutukkum tirumañcaṉattukkum Uḷḷiṭ

verikku kiḻakku meṟkut teṉpāṟkellai

ri nattattukku teṟkum I
ṉṉāṟperellaiyuḷ ni
rnilam Aṟuveliyu

vvūr ⌈

ri nir mu
ṉpu pā
ñcuvarukiṟapaṭi⌈
ye Iṉṉilattukku pāy
vutākavum Ittan=tiyappa
ṉeriyil nir Iṉṉila
m Aṟuvelikkume pā
yappeṟuvatā
kuvum Itaṟku Emmil
licain=tavilaipporu
ḷ kācu Irupatu Ikkācu
Irupatu mitaṟku vilaiyā
vutākavum Ūrome Iṟai yi
ṟukka nāṅkaḷ poliyūṭṭāka koṇṭa kācu nū
ṟu Ikkācu ṉūṟuṅ koṇṭu Ūrome Iṉṉila
ttāl van=ta ceṉṉiramañci tiruveḻiccikkuṭimai pe
ruvari cilliṟai Eccoṟu veṭṭi muṭṭaiyāḷ koyilvā
calāl pon=ta kuṭimai Eppeṟpaṭṭatum Iṉṉilattāl
van=ta Iṟai nāṅkaḷe yiṟukkakaṭavomākavum Iṉṉilattukku
vilaipporuḷum Iṟaipporuḷumāka caṇḍeśvaradevar pakkal nāṅkaḷ
koṇ
ṭa kācu nūṟṟirupa
tu Ikkācu nūṟṟiru
patuṅ koṇṭu
can=tirātittavarai ⌈
celvatāka śilāre
khai paṇṇikkuṭut
tom kiṭaṅkilāṉa
Irājentracoḻana
llūrom Ikkaḻaṉik
ku kuṭiiruppāka kaṭampuḻāṉ Araiyan
vaṉanāyakaṉāṉa rājatuṅkaviḻuppara
yaṉum Ikkuṭi maḻaikkaṇṇan Eṭu
ttapātamum titta naravaṇaiyāṉum I
vvaṉaivomuṭaiya kāṇiyāṉa pu
tucceri nattakkollaikku kiḻpā
ṟkellai Ittantiyappaṉeri karai
kku meṟkum tenpāṟkellai Ivverik
kiḻ ṉirnilattuk
ku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai periy
Eriyiṉiṉṟu tan=tiyappaṉkaḻani
kku nirpāyn=tuvarukiṟa vāykkālukku kiḻakkum vaṭa
pāṟkellai vatikku teṟkum Iṉṉāṟ⌈
perellai yuḷpaṭṭa nilattil Araaiyaṉ I
rāciṅkan pāti ṉikki Eṅkaḷuṭaiya cempātiyiṟ pātiyu
m maṇavilmalai maturān=takaṉāṉa kallakamāṉ tiṇ
ṭivaṉamuṭaiyarkoyil caṇṭecuratevaṟkku ku
ṭutta kācu pattu Ikkācu pattum caṇṭecuratevarpa
kkal Iṉṉilattukku vilaip
poruḷum Iṟaipporuḷu
mākak koṇṭu Iṉṉilattil
meṉokkiṉa maramuṅ kiṇo
kkiṉa kiṇaṟum maṉaiyum maṉaip
paṭappaiyum Iṟaiyili Aṉupavippatāka
vum Innilattāl van=taUppukkācu ceṉṉirama
ñci tiruveḻiccikuṭimai Eccoṟu kūṟṟunellu E
ppeṟpaṭṭaṉa ṉāṅkaḷe Iṟukkakkaṭavomāka vi
ṟṟu śilālekhai ceyvittu kuṭutto
m Ivvaṉaivom .
